name: customer_list
query: select `cu`.`customer_id` AS `ID`,concat(`cu`.`first_name`,' ',`cu`.`last_name`) AS `name`,`a`.`address` AS `address`,`a`.`postal_code` AS `zip code`,`a`.`phone` AS `phone`,`city`.`city` AS `city`,`country`.`country` AS `country`,if(`cu`.`active`,'active','') AS `notes`,`cu`.`store_id` AS `SID` from (((`customer` `cu` join `address` `a` on(`cu`.`address_id` = `a`.`address_id`)) join `city` on(`a`.`city_id` = `city`.`city_id`)) join `country` on(`city`.`country_id` = `country`.`country_id`))
